message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1400000. It's a great deal for both of us. Let me know what you think!

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the gesture, but given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet your asking price. I would like to propose an alternative at $1350000. I hope this aligns better with your valuation of the product.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $1400000, which is a good compromise for both of us.  It's still a great deal considering the value of the product.  Let's see if we can make this work!

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. While I appreciate the flexibility, I am still not able to meet the current asking price. I would like to propose an alternative at $1375000. I hope this proposal is within your consideration.

Bob, I've carefully considered your proposal.  While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, I can't go lower than $1400000. This price reflects the true value of the product.  If you're still interested, let's seal the deal. Otherwise, I'll be moving forward with another buyer.
